description: Otoshi`s Doduo is used against Team Rocket in an attempt to get back Otoshi`s stolen badges. However, it does quite bad in the battle against Jessie`s Arbok and barely escapes being captured by Jessie when Otoshi`s Marowak`s Bonemerang attack knocks the Pokeball out of the way.
name: Dodo (Saizou)
